attributes.action: Stop the EU's Treaty of Debt (ESM)
attributes.additional_details:
Stop the EU's Treaty of Debt (ESM)

For the last 16 years or so the European Union has not signed off their accounts blaming everyone but themselves for this reason.

The UK puts at least £48 million a day into this organisation without knowing what is happening to this contribution because of this failure to sign off the accounts.

As if that wasn’t enough, the EU now want even more of our money, with even less accountability !

There’s a four minute you tube video at watch?v=5CZr17HLH5U on what may be the future of Europe, which will FRIGHTEN you !

Write to your MP - web link at "writetothem" dot com, and say:-

"I want you to persuade the Government to stop this the EU-proposed ESM "Treaty of Debt"."

Act quickly.  Spread the word.  This petition has only three months to run

We, the undersigned, petition the Government to stop the EU-proposed ESM "Treaty of Debt"
